EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P Pre-Conference Training 9-17-18
EmailTemplate.subject: See You at the SpringOne Platform Pre-Conference Training!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/training]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming pre-conference training <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/training]]>Â at SpringOne Platform 2018. We are looking forward to seeing you there shortly.
In preparation of your class, you can access the lab setup guides here <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/1K1PDruknNXfJcETHvpvG3aoPD6MUcxVO/view?usp=sharing]]>. Please ensure your laptop meets the minimum hardware and technical specifications for your class.
If you have any questions about the material or courses, please feel free to reply to this email.
Kind regards, The SpringOne Platform Team
